name: Sticky Vision
description:
Get through all the levels as fast as you can! Only... you can't see the level as you move!

Sticky Vision is a simple 2D platformer made difficult by having your little character  only able move around when the lights are out. Toggle the lights using the light switches placed around the map by pressing 'E' on them. How fast can you get through them all?

Made for both the GeoJam 2021 (Theme: Switch) and the RNDGAME JAM II (Game name randomly generated using the RNDGAME).

I had a few issues allowing the game to be played in browser in time for the Jam, so it will be added at some point soon, it just wasn't there for this.
